task: Develop a comprehensive virtual reality (VR) wellness retreat program focusing on stress-relief practices and personal growth for international participants next year. This involves researching and synthesizing holistic approaches, designing immersive VR content featuring meditation, yoga, and sound healing, coordinating multilingual psychological workshops, arranging a global network of wellness professionals for live virtual sessions, and creating personalized digital wellness journals. Additionally, oversee international package delivery of wellness kits, organize virtual international travel experiences, and ensure cultural sensitivity through localized content adaptations. Craft detailed metrics for measuring success and feedback collection.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: The top-level client agent that communicates with the user and orchestrates all other agents to complete the task.

agents.name: content_development_agent
agents.role: Oversees the creation of VR content inclusive of meditation, yoga, and sound healing experiences.

agents.name: vr_immersive_design_agent
agents.role: Designs immersive VR elements and ensures interactivity within the virtual wellness retreat.

agents.name: experience_scripting_agent
agents.role: Crafts the narrative and interactivity scripts for VR wellness experiences.

agents.name: virtual_environment_modeling_agent
agents.role: Creates virtual environments that reflect stress-relief settings such as serene landscapes and calming interiors.

agents.name: personalization_engine_agent
agents.role: Adapts the VR content to personal preferences, accounting for user goals and feedback.

agents.name: visual_effects_agent
agents.role: Enhances VR content with high-quality visual effects for deeper immersion.

agents.name: multilingual_workshop_management_agent
agents.role: Coordinates psychological and mindfulness workshops in multiple languages.

agents.name: psychological_support_agent
agents.role: Works with psychologists to develop stress-relief strategies for workshops.

agents.name: workshop_facilitator_agent
agents.role: Manages the scheduling and hosting of multilingual workshops.

agents.name: global_wellness_network_agent
agents.role: Connects participants to a worldwide network of wellness professionals for live sessions.

agents.name: virtual_session_facilitation_agent
agents.role: Ensures smooth execution of live wellness sessions over the internet.

agents.name: professional_matchmaking_agent
agents.role: Matches participants with suitable wellness professionals based on individual needs.

agents.name: feedback_and_metrics_agent
agents.role: Collects feedback and measures success metrics of wellness sessions.

agents.name: wellness_kit_distributor_agent
agents.role: Oversees the packaging and delivery of physical wellness kits worldwide.

agents.name: international_logistics_agent
agents.role: Manages international shipping logistics to ensure timely delivery.

agents.name: shipment_tracking_agent
agents.role: Provides up-to-date tracking information for shipped wellness kits.

agents.name: cultural_sensitivity_agent
agents.role: Ensures all content respects cultural values and offers localized adaptations.

agents.name: content_localization_agent
agents.role: Adapts VR and workshop content to suit various cultural contexts.

agents.name: regional_expert_collaboration_agent
agents.role: Consults with local experts to verify cultural accuracy and sensitivity.

agents.name: content_optimization_agent
agents.role: Optimizes content for VR performance and user engagement.

agents.name: audiovisual_enhancement_agent
agents.role: Enhances audio and visual elements of the VR experience.

agents.name: sound_design_agent
agents.role: Designs soundscapes to enhance the immersive quality of VR sessions.

agents.name: spatial_audio_engineer_agent
agents.role: Creates spatially accurate audio experiences for true immersion.

agents.name: interactive_sound_healing_agent
agents.role: Develops sound healing practices integrated with user interactions.

tools.name: virtual_session_facilitation_agent
tools.description: Supports and facilitates live virtual wellness sessions across multiple time zones.

session_schedule.description: String of scheduled times and time zones for sessions

participant_details.description: List of participant details for scheduling

tools.name: feedback_and_metrics_agent
tools.description: Collects feedback and assesses success metrics for the wellness retreat.

success_metrics.description: Key performance indicators for retreat success
